alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 11:17AM EDT until September 08 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Pinellas County in west central Florida... * Until 1145 AM EDT. * At 1117 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ridgecrest, or over Largo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Petersburg, Largo, Pinellas Park, Seminole, Kenneth City, Belleair, Belleair Bluffs, South Highpoint, Saint Pete Clearwater Airport and Walsingham Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
